sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Reconnaissance Platoon conducts flight recon on 13 May 2024 at Land-Nav/West to test all new Skydio X2D systems capabilities while spotting enemy op’s and pushing enemies' location to Squadron Snipers to conduct stalks and improve combat readiness.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: Train all operators on how to use and implement thermals to find enemy OP’s while relaying enemy location to Snipers to conduct stalks.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct familiarization for all new SKYDIO systems.
Conduct stalks training for Snipers.
Conduct OP training for all dismounts in the Reconnaissance Platoon.
sections.END STATE:
The Reconnaissance Platoon successfully completes flight familiarization for all operators and test all thermal capabilities. All new Snipers are trained and proficient in stalks furthering their knowledge in section.
Training Objectives
Conduct flight familiarization training.
Teach stalk training for all new soldiers in Sniper section.
Conduct OP training for all Scouts.
